changeSet.author: mcpierce
changeSet.createView: SELECT d.comic_book_id as comic_book_id, d.comic_detail_id AS comic_detail_id, d.filename, d.archive_type, d.publisher, d.imprint, d.series, d.volume, d.issue_number, d.title, d.cover_date, d.store_date, CASE WHEN EXISTS(SELECT * FROM comic_metadata_sources s WHERE s.comic_book_id = d.comic_book_id) THEN true ELSE false END AS is_scraped FROM comic_details d WHERE d.comic_book_id IN (SELECT comic_book_id FROM comic_books WHERE organizing IS TRUE AND file_contents_loaded IS TRUE AND purging IS FALSE AND edit_details IS FALSE AND target_archive_type IS NULL AND update_metadata IS FALSE)
